Parameters: DialogInterface: the dialog where the selection was made
int: the position of the item in the list that was clicked
boolean: true if the click checked the item, else false
onClick(android.content.DialogInterface,.Description: This method will be invoked when an item in the dialog is clicked.
onClick(android.content.DialogInterface,.FullName: public abstract void onClick (DialogInterface dialog, int which, boolean isChecked)

ClassDesc: Interface used to allow the creator of a dialog to run some code when an item in a multi-choice dialog is clicked.
